paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Mean age 40.4 years, predominantly from Portugal

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The matched, treated sample consisted predominantly of subjects with the Val30Met genotype (92.5%), from Portugal, and with a mean age of 40.4 years.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant is associated with severe disease progression.

variants.additional_notes: The study primarily focused on the Val30Met variant.
key_quotes: Of the more than 100 TTR genotypes identified, the most common is Val30Met.
Survival time from disease onset to death is approximately 10 years on average.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on the TTR gene and its variants.
